newsitem.title: JAPAN: PRESS DIGEST - Top Japan business news - Dec 12.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Top Japan business news - Dec 12.

text.p: Government and ruling Liberal Democratic Party to submit fiscal reform bill during parliament session to open in January. Bill expected to provide for setting of spending ceilings on programmes such as social security and public works.
Ministry of Home Affairs has decided to limit to one percent growth of revenues from property taxes on land in the year ending March 1988 due to fall in land prices.
